definition[1]: frozen food has been stored at a very low temperature in order to preserve it
example[0]: You can use fresh or frozen fish.
definition[2]: earth that is frozen is so cold it has become very hard
example[2]: The ground is frozen for most of the year.
definition[3]: a river, lake etc that is frozen has a layer of ice on the surface
definition[4]: frozen food is stored at very low temperatures in order to preserve it
definition[5]: frozen assets, accounts etc cannot be used by their owners, for example because there is a legal disagreement concerning them
example[5]: Tens of thousands of legal claims are being made by companies attempting to have their frozen assets returned.
example[6]: the estimated $100 million in frozen Cuban accounts in the United States
